grimoire.command.enchant.incompatible: That enchantment is incompatible with existing ones
grimoire.gui.scriptorium.title: Scriptorium
grimoire.gui.enchantment.title: Enchantments
enchantment.grimoire.blindness.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Blindness {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.frozen.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Slowness {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.levitation.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Levitation {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.nausea.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Nausea {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.poison.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Poison {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.wither.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Wither {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.decay.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Wither {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.petrified.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Slowness {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.venom.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to apply Poison {I:amplifier} on target for {ts:duration}s
enchantment.grimoire.antidote.desc:
Automatically weakens harmful effects
Chance: {%:chance}% every second
enchantment.grimoire.refill.desc: Automatically consumes food when health below {threshold}
enchantment.grimoire.vampire.desc: When health falls below half, there is {%:chance}% chance to convert {%:transferRate}% of damage dealt into usable health
enchantment.grimoire.aftershock.desc: Deals {%:damageRate}% fall damage to nearby mobs
enchantment.grimoire.thunder.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to strike lightning on the target
enchantment.grimoire.exchange.desc: Exchanges positions of the shooter and target
enchantment.grimoire.arrow_rain.desc: Shoots x{amount} additional arrows at once dealing {%:damageRatio}% of first damage
enchantment.grimoire.dash.desc: Has {%:chance}% chance to surf forward and deal {%:damageRatio}% of first damage to nearby mobs in a radius of {radius}
enchantment.grimoire.dash.desc.finalBonu: [Bonus] Raise the final damage ratio to {%:specialDamageRatio}%
